channel.title: Guides on Elixirscript
channel.description: Recent content in Guides on Elixirscript

item.title: using with phoenix
item.description: This guide will walk through setting up a Phoenix project with Elixirscript. This guide assumes you have already created a Phoenix project Update: 2017-08-15: This guide has been updated to cover both ElixirScript 0.30 and Phoenix 1.3 Update your mix.exs file to add the current version of elixirscript to your dependencies: defp deps do [ #other deps {:elixir_script, "~> x.x"} ] Run mix deps.get: mix deps.get Next, Add the elixir_script compiler to your list of mix compilers.
